summary: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.
cast: Karl Urban|Rosamund Pike|Deobia Oparei|Ben Daniels|Razaaq Adoti|Richard Brake|Al Weaver|Dexter Fletcher|Brian Steele|Dwayne Johnson|Yao Chin|Robert Russell|Daniel York|Ian Hughes|Sara Houghton|Blanka Jarosova|Vladislav Dyntera|Petr Hnetkovský|Jaroslav Psenicka|Marek Motlicek|Doug Jones|Rana Morrison|Barbara Nedeljakova|Robert Nelson|Tanoai Reed
keywords: survival|brother sister relationship|based on video game|monster|hell
title: Doom
